trans-unit.source: Madmom Analyzes Digitized Music Of Musicians
trans-unit.target: 疯妈分析音乐人的数字化音乐

trans-unit.source: Madmom is an audio signal processing library written in Python with a strong focus on music information retrieval (MIR) tasks.
trans-unit.target: Madmom是一个用Python编写的音频信号处理库,专注于音乐信息检索(MIR)任务。

trans-unit.source: Mostly Audio / Dominantly Music Oriented Modules

trans-unit.source: New MIDI module (io.midi) replacing (utils.midi) based on mido (#46)

Please do not try to install from the .zip files provided by GitHub. Rather install it from package (if you just want to use it) or source (if you plan to use it for development) by following the instructions below. Whichever variant you choose, please make sure that all prerequisites are installed.
trans-unit.target: 请不要尝试从GitHub提供的.zip文件进行安装。请按照下面的说明从软件包(如果你只是想使用它)或源码(如果你打算将它用于开发)进行安装。无论你选择哪种方式,请确保所有的先决条件都已安装。

trans-unit.source: Please note that the program itself as well as the modes have help messages:
trans-unit.target: 请注意,程序本身和模式都有帮助信息。

trans-unit.source: Please refer to the requirements.txt file for the minimum required versions and make sure that these modules are up to date, otherwise it can result in unexpected errors or false computations!
trans-unit.target: 请参阅requirements.txt文件以获取最低要求的版本，并确保这些模块是最新的，否则可能导致意外错误或错误的计算！

trans-unit.source: The package has two licenses, one for source code and one for model/data files.
trans-unit.target: 该软件包有两个许可证,一个是源代码,一个是模型/数据文件。

trans-unit.source: To update the models contained in the submodule:

trans-unit.source: To upgrade the package, please use the same mechanism (pip vs. source) as you did for installation. If you want to change from package to source, please uninstall the package first.
trans-unit.target: 要升级软件包,请使用与安装时相同的机制(pip与源码)。如果你想从包改成源码,请先卸载包。

trans-unit.source: Unless indicated otherwise, all model and data files are distributed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 license.

trans-unit.source: Unless indicated otherwise, all source code files are published under the BSD license. For details, please see the LICENSE file.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有说明，否则所有源代码文件都是根据BSD许可发布的。有关详细信息，请参阅LICENSE文件。
